headline: Hero Gum Debuts at New York Mets Game, Providing Fans Opportunity to Sign Up for Gift of Life Marrow Registry
summary: New initiative makes joining the stem cell registry as easy as chewing gum Gift of Life Debuts Hero Gum at NY Mets Game Gift of Life Marrow Registry was honored as the Nonprofit of the Game at the NY Mets game on August 1, 2025 at Citi Field as part of its Hero Gum debut. (Photo l-r: adam&eveDDB Executive Director Alan Perlmanadam&eveDDB Executive Creative Director Jason Ashlock, Gift of Life COO Marti Freund and Gift of Life Founder & CEO Jay Feinberg) NEW YORK, Aug. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -
